channel.title: Piano on Mathew A. Kramer
channel.description: Recent content in Piano on Mathew A. Kramer

item.title: Improvisation series (2/?): The Encounter
item.description: The second in my “series” revisiting one-off things I’ve played. This piece depicts an encounter between the party and some kind of foe—but are they really a foe? Why do they seem to know one of you? Between bouts, a conflictedness begins to grow. Listen below! mathew · Vignette: The Encounter (Improvisation Series)

item.title: TGDNE series (1/?): Oops! You found the forest boss
item.description: This was orignally meant to be my submission for a course on video game music I took on the side this semester. I ended up getting to do a collaboration with a great dev team and produce music for an actual game, but I didn’t want to abandon this one. So, it gets to be the first entry in my “This Game Does Not Exist” collection of game-inspired but as yet un-play-tested music!

item.title: Improvisation series (1/?): The Haven
item.description: To practice coming back to ideas, I’m trying to build a habit of revisiting the things I happen to improvise while bored (or procrastinating) and clean them up a bit. “Vignette: The Haven,” the first in this series, depicts a place of rest—a city or town, perhaps—but hints at tensions building in the background, a dark past. mathew · Vignette: The Haven (Improvisation Series)
